verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Now shalt thou see <S%H7200><s%> what I will do <S%H6213><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>: for by a strong <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> shall he let them go <S%H7971><s%>, and by a strong <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> shall he drive them out <S%H1644><s%> of his land <S%H776><s%>.
And God <S%H430><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3068><s%>, I am Jehovah:

and I appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto Abraham <S%H85><s%>, unto Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, as God <S%H410><s%> Almighty <S%H7706><s%>; but by my name <S%H8034><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> I was not known to them <S%H3045><s%>.

And I have also established <S%H6965><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them <S%H5414><s%>, to give them the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, the land <S%H776><s%> of their sojournings <S%H4033><s%>, wherein they sojourned <S%H1481><s%>.

And moreover I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the groaning <S%H5009><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, whom <S%H834><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> keep in bondage <S%H5647><s%>; and I have remembered <S%H2142><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

Wherefore <S%H3651><s%> say <S%H559><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and I will bring <S%H3318><s%> you out from under the burdens <S%H5450><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>, and I will rid <S%H5337><s%> you out of their bondage <S%H5656><s%>, and I will redeem <S%H1350><s%> you with an outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>, and with great <S%H1419><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%>:

and I will take <S%H3947><s%> you to me for a people <S%H5971><s%>, and I will be to you a God <S%H430><s%>; and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, who bringeth <S%H3318><s%> you out from under the burdens <S%H5450><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>.

And I will bring <S%H935><s%> you in unto the land <S%H776><s%> which I sware <S%H5375><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> to Abraham <S%H85><s%>, to Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and to Jacob <S%H3290><s%>; and I will give <S%H5414><s%> it you for a heritage <S%H4181><s%>: I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> so unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: but they hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> for anguish <S%H7115><s%> of spirit <S%H7307><s%>, and for cruel <S%H7186><s%> bondage <S%H5656><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Go <S%H935><s%> in <S%H1696><s%>, speak unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, that he let the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go out <S%H7971><s%> of his land <S%H776><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H1121><s%>, the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> have not hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto me <S%H6547><s%>; how then shall Pharaoh hear <S%H8085><s%> me <S%H589><s%>, who am of uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%>?

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and gave them a charge <S%H6680><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, to bring <S%H3318><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

These are the heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%>. The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> the first-born <S%H1060><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: Hanoch <S%H2585><s%>, and Pallu <S%H6396><s%>, Hezron <S%H2696><s%>, and Carmi <S%H3756><s%>; these are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%>: Jemuel <S%H3223><s%>, and Jamin <S%H3226><s%>, and Ohad <S%H161><s%>, and Jachin <S%H3199><s%>, and Zohar <S%H6714><s%>, and Shaul <S%H7586><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of a Canaanitish woman <S%H3669><s%>; these are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%>.

And these are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> according to their generations <S%H8435><s%>: Gershon <S%H1648><s%>, and Kohath <S%H6955><s%>, and Merari <S%H4847><s%>; and the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> were a hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%>: Libni <S%H3845><s%> and Shimei <S%H8096><s%>, according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%>: Amram <S%H6019><s%>, and Izhar <S%H3324><s%>, and Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, and Uzziel <S%H5816><s%>; and the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> were a hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>: Mahli <S%H4249><s%> and Mushi <S%H4187><s%>. These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Levites <S%H3878><s%> according to their generations <S%H8435><s%>.

And Amram <S%H6019><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> him Jochebed <S%H3115><s%> his father <S%H1733><s%>'s sister to wife <S%H802><s%>; and she bare <S%H3205><s%> him Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%>: and the years <S%H8141><s%> of the life <S%H2416><s%> of Amram <S%H6019><s%> were a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Izhar <S%H3324><s%>: Korah <S%H7141><s%>, and Nepheg <S%H5298><s%>, and Zichri <S%H2147><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel <S%H5816><s%>: Mishael <S%H4332><s%>, and Elzaphan <S%H469><s%>, and Sithri <S%H5644><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> him Elisheba <S%H472><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Amminadab <S%H5992><s%>, the sister <S%H269><s%> of Nahshon <S%H5177><s%>, to wife <S%H802><s%>; and she bare <S%H3205><s%> him Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu <S%H30><s%>, Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar <S%H385><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah <S%H7141><s%>: Assir <S%H617><s%>, and Elkanah <S%H511><s%>, and Abiasaph <S%H23><s%>; these are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Korahites <S%H7145><s%>.

And Eleazar <S%H499><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> him one of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Putiel <S%H6317><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%>; and she bare <S%H3205><s%> him Phinehas <S%H6372><s%>. These are the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

These <S%H1931><s%> are that Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%>, to whom <S%H834><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Bring out <S%H3318><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> according to their hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

These <S%H1992><s%> are they that spake <S%H1696><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, to bring out <S%H3318><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: these are that Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%>.
And it came to pass on the day <S%H3117><s%> when Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>,

that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: speak <S%H1696><s%> thou unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> all that I speak unto thee <S%H1696><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Behold <S%H6189><s%>, I am of uncircumcised lips <S%H8193><s%>, and how shall Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> hearken unto me <S%H8085><s%>?
